Package CCDD

Class CcddDbVerificationHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddDbVerificationHandler
public class CcddDbVerificationHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary database verification handler class

    • CcddDbVerificationHandler

      CcddDbVerificationHandler(CcddMain ccddMain)
      Database verification handler class constructor
      Parameters:
      ccddMain - Main class

  • Method Details

    • verifyDatabase

      private void verifyDatabase()
      Perform a consistency check of the project database. Query the user for permission to make corrections, then apply the corrections at completion of the check. This method is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the table data consistency check completes execution

    • verifyOwners

      private void verifyOwners()
      Check that the owner role matches for the project database and its tables, sequences, indices, and functions. A database administrator is required in order to alter the owner role(s) to match the database owner; this must be done outside the application. If any mismatch is detected then the issue is logged for information purposes only

    • verifyInternalTables

      private void verifyInternalTables(ResultSet tableResult)
      Check that the internal tables are consistent with their definitions. If any inconsistencies are detected then get user approval to alter the table(s)
      Parameters:
      tableResult - Metadata for all tables

    • verifyInputTypes

      private void verifyInputTypes(ResultSet tableResult)
      Check that the input types in the table types and data fields internal tables are valid. If any invalid entries are detected then get user approval to alter the table(s)
      Parameters:
      tableResult - Metadata for all tables

    • verifyPathReferences

      private void verifyPathReferences(ResultSet tableResult)
      Check that the references to tables and variables in the internal tables are valid. If any invalid entries are detected then get user approval to alter the table(s)
      Parameters:
      tableResult - Metadata for all tables

    • getInternalTableMembers

      private List<String[]> getInternalTableMembers(String intTableName, String intTableColumnA, String intTableColumnB)
      Query the specified internal table in the database for the specified column entries that reference tables or variables
      Parameters:
      intTableName - Internal table name to query
      intTableColumnA - Name of the column in the internal table column name from which to obtain the entries
      intTableColumnB - Name of the second column in the internal table column name from which to obtain the entries; null if no second column is requested
      Returns:
      List of table or variable entries from the specified column in the specified internal table

    • verifyDataFieldInheritance

      private void verifyDataFieldInheritance()
      Check that the table type data fields are inherited by all tables of that type. If any inconsistencies are detected then get user approval to update the field(s)

    • verifyTableTypeCmdArgRef

      private void verifyTableTypeCmdArgRef()
      Check that the table type command argument reference flags are present and consistent with their type definitions. If any missing flags or inconsistencies are detected then get user approval to alter the table(s)

    • verifyTableTypes

      private void verifyTableTypes(ResultSet tableResult)
      Check that the tables are consistent with their type definitions. If any inconsistencies are detected then get user approval to alter the table(s)
      Parameters:
      tableResult - Metadata for all tables

    • verifyValuesTable

      private void verifyValuesTable()
      Check if the custom value table has more than one entry for a table path and column name pair. If one or more duplicate rows is detected then get user approval to delete the duplicate row(s)

    • verifyDataTables

      private void verifyDataTables()
      Check that the tables' data are consistent with their type definitions. If any inconsistencies are detected then get user approval to alter the table(s)

    • verifyMessageIDs

      private void verifyMessageIDs()
      Verify that duplicate message IDs do not exist

    • goToNextArrayMember

      private void goToNextArrayMember()
      Increment the current array index value(s) to the next array member

    • checkInputType

      private void checkInputType(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, int column)
      Check if the cell value matches the expected input type
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      column - Column index

    • checkExcessArrayMember

      private boolean checkExcessArrayMember(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, String arrayName)
      Check if an extra array member exists
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      arrayName - Array variable name
      Returns:
      True if an extra array member is detected

    • checkForArrayDefinition

      private boolean checkForArrayDefinition(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, String arrayName)
      Check if the expected array definition exists
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      arrayName - Array variable name
      Returns:
      True if the array definition is missing

    • checkArrayNamesMatch

      private boolean checkArrayNamesMatch(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, int lastArrayRow, String arrayName)
      Check if the variable name is an array member, but it doesn't match the array definition and its members or is not the next array member in sequence. This implies that one or more array members are missing as well as the next array variable's definition
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      lastArrayRow - Last row index in the array
      arrayName - Array variable name
      Returns:
      True if an an array name mismatch is detected

    • checkArraySizesMatch

      private void checkArraySizesMatch(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, String arrayName, String arraySize)
      Check if the array size is the same for the array definition and all of it members
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      arrayName - Array variable name
      arraySize - Number of members in the array

    • checkDataTypesMatch

      private void checkDataTypesMatch(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, String arrayName, String dataType)
      Check if the data type is the same for the array definition and all of it members
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      arrayName - Array variable name
      dataType - Type array data type

    • checkForMissingArrayMember

      private void checkForMissingArrayMember(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, int row, String arrayName)
      Check if the array doesn't have an expected member
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      row - Row index
      arrayName - Array variable name

    • checkForRowIndexMismatch

      private void checkForRowIndexMismatch(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo)
      Check if a row index doesn't match the expected value
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information

    • checkForDuplicates

      private void checkForDuplicates(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo)
      Check if a column marked as unique for this table type has duplicate values in one or more rows
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information

    • addMissingArrayRow

      private String[] addMissingArrayRow(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo tableInfo, String arrayName, int[] arrayMemberIndex)
      Add a missing array definition or member
      Parameters:
      tableInfo - Reference to the table information
      arrayName - Array variable name
      arrayMemberIndex - Current array member index
      Returns:
      Array containing the new array row data

    • updateIssuesTableData

      private void updateIssuesTableData(CcddDbVerificationHandler.TableIssue issue, List<Object[]> tableData)
      Set the current issue's table data to that supplied. Check if any other issue is for the same table and, if so, replace the issue's table data with the current issue's table data so that any changes are reflected in all the instances of the table
      Parameters:
      issue - Reference to the current issue
      tableData - Table data for the current issue

    • buildUpdates

      private void buildUpdates(CcddDbVerificationHandler.TableStorage tblStrg)
      Compare the current table data to the committed table data and create lists of the changed values necessary to update the table in the database to match the current values
      Parameters:
      tblStrg - Reference to the table information and committed data

    • updateDatabase

      private void updateDatabase()
      Perform the corrections to the database authorized by the user
